title: President of the Republic holds phone talks with Niger’s counterpart
text: The President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, held on March 30, 2021, a telephone conversation with his brother President of Niger Mohamed Bazoum.

The two presidents welcomed the exceptional level of the relations between Algeria and Niger, examined ways to promote them and exchanged views on the main issues of common interest.On this occasion, the President of the Republic reiterated “his wishes to President Mohamed Bazoum for the trust placed in him by the people of Niger.
